page.title: 13Saturday At Home
page.content: I wake up at 6.30 and go down stairs and make a cup of tea for everyone. Then I watch telly, often BBC 1's{Saturday Picture Show}. I get dressed and washed, then play with my friends or play in the garden with my sister. At lunchtime I have sandwiches and potato crisps, then play out. I come in, watch the telly, have my tea which will be something like chops and chips and peas. I watch more telly then go to bed at 9.00 pm. We go to Angus's house on our{BMX {bikes}and play with his{Computer}, then we go to play{Pitch and Putt}in the park, then we play{Crazy Golf}. When we get our deposit for the clubs back we buy some sweets and ride around the park.
